original_title: Mr. Men - The Great Alphabet Hunt
overview: The Mr. Men and Little Misses are going on an alphabet treasure hunt field trip on the Misterland Bus to see what things they can find to make up all the letters of the alphabet.
tagline: Educational animated fun with the Mr Men, as Mr Clever takes his friends on a bus trip and tries to find a different object for every letter of the alphabet.
title: Mr. Men - The Great Alphabet Hunt
